title: Ruth Farmer. A story
author: Marchbank, Agnes.
snippet: Roy Paterson had seen little of the old town ofEdinburgh, and when the cab rattled along Lauristonand turned into the quiet side street, he lookedout and gave a hasty glance around, noting everything and understanding something of the life hiswife had led all these years: quiet, a trifle dullmay be, useful certainly ; altogether unlike what anyone would have expected of her.
